text: Noel Thomas David Gallagher (born 29 May 1967) is a British musician and singer-songwriter. Gallagher is lead guitarist and main songwriter for the band Oasis. He left the band in 2009 following an argument with his younger brother and Oasis' frontman Liam. And as announced on August 27th 2024, he will rejoin Oasis for a 2025 live tour. In 2011 he released his first solo album Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds.
